Message:
Urd, Belldandy, Skuld.
The three of us were sisters.

But then they died,
Mother lost her mind,
and my life faded away from me.

“Live your life as you like...”
It was all just a ruse to
get rid of me.

I not only lost my name,
but my home, too.

No... I never had either
of them to begin with.

I only existed in the
shadow of my sisters,

and never once had
a place I could be me.

Who the heck...am I...?
I might as well not even be alive.

I have no evidence that
shows who, or what I am.

So I’m sure that can only
mean one thing—
“Skuld” doesn’t exist.
